description.en: event fired when the control is displayed on a non HTML5 compliant browser
description.jp: event fired when the control is displayed on a non HTML5 compliant browser

description.en:
Raised when the slice is clicked.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.slice to get reference to slice object.
   Use ui.slice.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.slice.isExploded to get is the slice exploded.
   Use ui.slice.isSelected to get is the slice selected.
description.jp:
Raised when the slice is clicked.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
   Use ui.slice to get reference to slice object.
   Use ui.slice.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.slice.isExploded to get is the slice exploded.
   Use ui.slice.isSelected to get is the slice selected.

description.en:
event fired after a tooltip is hidden
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
description.jp:
event fired after a tooltip is hidden
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.

description.en:
event fired when the mouse has left an element and the tooltip is about to hide
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.

event fired when the mouse has left an element and the tooltip is about to hide
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.

description.en:
event fired when the mouse has hovered on an element long enough to display a tooltip
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.
description.jp:
event fired when the mouse has hovered on an element long enough to display a tooltip
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.

description.en:
event fired after a tooltip is shown
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current pie chart item.
   Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object.

   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element.
   Use ui.item to get reference to current pie chart item.

description.en: Gets or sets whether the slices can be exploded.
description.jp: Gets or sets whether the slices can be exploded.

description.en: Gets or sets whether the slices can be selected.
description.jp: Gets or sets whether the slices can be selected.

description.en:
Gets or sets the Brushes property.
   The brushes property defines the palette from which automatically assigned slice brushes are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the Brushes property.
   The brushes property defines the palette from which automatically assigned slice brushes are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

description.en: Plette from which automatically assigned slice brushes are selected.
description.jp: Plette from which automatically assigned slice brushes are selected.

description.en: can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself
description.jp: can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself

description.en: Explicitly set data source type (such as "json"). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.
description.jp: Explicitly set data source type (such as "json"). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.

description.en: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it
description.jp: Specifies a remote URL accepted by $.ig.DataSource in order to request data from it

description.en: Determines how much the exploded slice is offset from the center. Value between 0 and 1.
description.jp: Determines how much the exploded slice is offset from the center. Value between 0 and 1.

description.en:
Gets or sets the collection of exploded slice indices.
Should be an array of integers that indicate the indexes of the slices to explode.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the collection of exploded slice indices.
Should be an array of integers that indicate the indexes of the slices to explode.

description.en: The index of the slices to explode
description.jp: The index of the slices to explode

description.en:
Gets or sets the function to use to transform a pie slice data context into a label for the slice. Function takes one argument of type object.
   Use context.item to get the item associated with the slice, if any.
   Use context.actualItemBrush to get the brush used to paint the slice.
   Use context.outline to get the outline brush used to paint the slice.
   Use context.itemLabel to get the label object that would be used for the slice.
   Use context.percentValue to see the percentage value that is associated with the slice.
   Use context.isOthersSlice to tell if the associated slice is the others slice.
   Should return a string value that should be used for the label.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the function to use to transform a pie slice data context into a label for the slice. Function takes one argument of type object.
   Use context.item to get the item associated with the slice, if any.
   Use context.actualItemBrush to get the brush used to paint the slice.
   Use context.outline to get the outline brush used to paint the slice.
   Use context.itemLabel to get the label object that would be used for the slice.
   Use context.percentValue to see the percentage value that is associated with the slice.
   Use context.isOthersSlice to tell if the associated slice is the others slice.
   Should return a string value that should be used for the label.

description.en: The height of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
description.jp: The height of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

description.en: Gets or sets the pixel amount, by which the labels are offset from the edge of the slices.
description.jp: Gets or sets the pixel amount, by which the labels are offset from the edge of the slices.

description.en: Gets or sets the property name that contains the labels.
description.jp: Gets or sets the property name that contains the labels.

description.en: Specifies the chart label position
description.jp: Specifies the chart label position

description.en: No labels will be displayed.
description.jp: No labels will be displayed.

description.en: Labels will be displayed in the center.
description.jp: Labels will be displayed in the center.

description.en: Labels will be displayed inside and by the edge of the container.
description.jp: Labels will be displayed inside and by the edge of the container.

description.en: Labels will be displayed outside the container.
description.jp: Labels will be displayed outside the container.

description.en: Labels will automatically decide their location.
description.jp: Labels will automatically decide their location.

description.en: Gets or sets the margin between a label and the end of its leader line.
description.jp: Gets or sets the margin between a label and the end of its leader line.

description.en: Specifies the type of the igPieChart leader line
description.jp: Specifies the type of the igPieChart leader line

description.en: Defines a stright leader line of the igPieChart
description.jp: Defines a stright leader line of the igPieChart

description.en: Defines a simple curve to be the igPieChart leader line
description.jp: Defines a simple curve to be the igPieChart leader line

description.en: Defines a radial curve to be the igPieChart leader line
description.jp: Defines a radial curve to be the igPieChart leader line

description.en: Specifies the visibility of the igPieChart leader line
description.jp: Specifies the visibility of the igPieChart leader line

description.en: The igPieChart leader line is visible
description.jp: The igPieChart leader line is visible

description.en: The igPieChart leader line is collapsed
description.jp: The igPieChart leader line is collapsed

description.en: can be any valid options accepted by $.ig.ChartLegend, or an instance of an $.ig.ChartLegend itself.
description.jp: can be any valid options accepted by $.ig.ChartLegend, or an instance of an $.ig.ChartLegend itself.

description.en: The name of the element to turn into a legend.
description.jp: The name of the element to turn into a legend.

description.en: Type of the legend.
description.jp: Type of the legend.

description.en: Specify the legend as item legend. It displays a legend item for each pie in the igPieChart control.
description.jp: Specify the legend as item legend. It displays a legend item for each pie in the igPieChart control.

description.en: Specify the legend as legend. It is supported by all types of series in the igDataChart control.
description.jp: Specify the legend as legend. It is supported by all types of series in the igDataChart control.

description.en: The width of the legend.
description.jp: The width of the legend.

description.en: The height of the legend.
description.jp: The height of the legend.

description.en:
Gets or sets the LegendItemBadgeTemplate property.
   The legend item badge is created according to the LegendItemBadgeTemplate on-demand by
   the chart object itself.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate
description.jp:
Gets or sets the LegendItemBadgeTemplate property.
   The legend item badge is created according to the LegendItemBadgeTemplate on-demand by
   the chart object itself.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

description.en:
Gets or sets the LegendItemTemplate property.
   The legend item control content is created according to the LegendItemTemplate on-demand by
   the chart object itself.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate
description.jp:
Gets or sets the LegendItemTemplate property.
   The legend item control content is created according to the LegendItemTemplate on-demand by
   the chart object itself.
   The provided object should have properties called render and optionally measure. See definition for option: legendItemBadgeTemplate

description.en: Gets or sets a style object that can be used to override the style settings on the others category slice.
description.jp: Gets or sets a style object that can be used to override the style settings on the others category slice.

description.en: Gets or sets the label of the Others slice.
description.jp: Gets or sets the label of the Others slice.

description.en: Gets or sets the threshold value that determines if slices are grouped into the Others slice.
description.jp: Gets or sets the threshold value that determines if slices are grouped into the Others slice.

description.en: Gets or sets whether to use numeric or percent-based threshold value.
description.jp: Gets or sets whether to use numeric or percent-based threshold value.

description.en: Data value is compared directly to the value of OthersCategoryThreshold.
description.jp: Data value is compared directly to the value of OthersCategoryThreshold.

description.en: Data value is compared to OthersCategoryThreshold as a percentage of the total.
description.jp: Data value is compared to OthersCategoryThreshold as a percentage of the total.

description.en:
Gets or sets the Outlines property.
   The Outlines property defines the palette from which automatically assigned slice outlines are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the Outlines property.
   The Outlines property defines the palette from which automatically assigned slice outlines are selected.
   The value provided should be an array of css color strings. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

description.en: Gets or sets the scaling factor of the chart's radius. Value between 0 and 1.
description.jp: Gets or sets the scaling factor of the chart's radius. Value between 0 and 1.

description.en: see $.ig.DataSource. Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.
description.jp: see $.ig.DataSource. Specifies the name of the property in which data records are held if the response is wrapped.

description.en: Gets or sets the style used when a slice is selected.
description.jp: Gets or sets the style used when a slice is selected.

description.en: Whether the chart should render a tooltip.
description.jp: Whether the chart should render a tooltip.

description.en:
Gets or sets the starting angle of the chart.
   The default zero value is equivalent to 3 o'clock.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the starting angle of the chart.
   The default zero value is equivalent to 3 o'clock.

description.en: Specifies the igPieChart sweep direction
description.jp: Specifies the igPieChart sweep direction

description.en: Defines the igPieChart sweep direction to be anticlockwise
description.jp: Defines the igPieChart sweep direction to be anticlockwise

description.en: Defines the igPieChart sweep direction to follow the clock arrow
description.jp: Defines the igPieChart sweep direction to follow the clock arrow

description.en: Overrides the style used for text in the pie chart.
description.jp: Overrides the style used for text in the pie chart.

description.en: The swatch used to style this widget
description.jp: The swatch used to style this widget

description.en: The name of template or the template itself that chart tooltip will use to render.
description.jp: The name of template or the template itself that chart tooltip will use to render.

description.en: Gets or Sets the property name that contains the values.
description.jp: Gets or Sets the property name that contains the values.

description.en: The width of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
description.jp: The width of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
